# file_generator
Generate files of precise size!

# Usage (with git):
1. git clone https://github.com/Elight-by/file_generator
2. cd file_generator
3. python main.py

# Usage (without git):
1. Download the entire repository or the files: main.py and settings.json. It's best to put them in the same folder.
2. Start file main.py on your IDE or IDLE

**The generated file will be located in the folder where the code is running.**
